sentence: My girlfriend and I chose this hotel based on it is location and affordable price for getaway vacation without the kids
Excellent price in great South Beach Location

It is a great hotel the room was clean free happy hour the staff was more than helpful 10 the only thing is add 20 for valet per 24 hours it is extra no parking available for blocks we paid park your car yourself and walk or cab around
I loved the location of the hotel especially for its price
Great hotel good location for the price and free airport shuttle
We were satisfied with the stay for the money felt the cost justified the level of quality
Decent hotel with good price and great location in the heart of South Beach
Very good value for the price
Pretty nice hotel like 2 blocks away from Ocean Dr Nice hotel close to the beach I just think is a Lil too expensive for what you get but I will go back definitely
Good points the price was right and the staff allowed us to check in early and valet park early and that out weighted the negative aspects for us
Stay the hell away from this hotel I do not care how cheap you wana get btw rooms cost was 240 per night
Yes it may be cheap and by the beach but trust me pay an extra 50 and stay elsewhere
Lastly I asked them on check out day to not charge everything on one card they said no problem
This is not a five star hotel so the charges do not suit the hotel
For what we needed the hotel was OK and not sure how this was even rated 34 on Expedia
i was charged more than i have ever spent for a hotel including 5 star 4 seasons etc and had a horrible stay
For the amount of money you pay here you can stay at a nice chain hotel for a week
Do your safe a favor pay more for something you will feel comfortable staying in
I felt like I over paid for what I got
Notwithstanding the above cleanliness is my number 1 priority and Price was good too so we left happy
Place needs to be upgraded very old but good hotel for the price
You get what you pay for and its worth the money
They did nt really accommodate for late check outs they charge you for every little thing
Close to Ocean Drice and the beach
Beach umbrella was at an extre 20 charge
This was my first time staying at this hotel and I must say it is a great value for the price
This hotel is rated 4 stars on Expedia but it must be wrong
Charming hotel and staff for a great price

honestly not that great smallest pool i ve ever seen some of the sheets they gave us had holes in them and housekeeping kept taking our wash clothes and not replacing them the minibar they try to scam you with takes up half your space just very espensive for what you get only good thing is convenient and very good location

I enjoyed the pool side that had a bar a few steps away where servers would come serve you while you relax and unwind near the pool I feel like the hotel can upgrade there complementary breakfast a littler more we had to pay for things like eggs and even jam
We were handed another menu with good breakfast choices the catch you have to pay to order from that menu
Reasonable price and good happy hour at the attached restaurant
Amazing hotel good price central location lovely rooms
